abstract: This showreel is a light hearted look into the Australian experience of South Vietnam through the eyes of those who were there.
description: This showreel is a light hearted look into the Australian experience of South Vietnam through the eyes of those who were there. Using some of the home movies in the Memorial’s film collection and actuality recordings of the time – including the voice of a young trooper, recording an audio letter for his parents - we take you behind the battle lines and into the mess tent. Maybe you’ll even see someone you know. Source: AWM
